description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Munich, Germany. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Five-Star Central Munich Escape with Rooftop Pool near Maximilianstraße
hotels.description: Hidden behind the iconic Hofbräuhaus beer cellar and steps from Maximilianstraße, the five-star Mandarin Oriental, Munich, is your centrally located gateway to the city's picturesque Old Town. Steps from the hotel's front door, discover the high-end shopping and effortless glamour of Maximilianstrasse, or simply relax in your palatial accommodation. Go beyond the ornate entrance and grand lobby staircase and discover the onsite Turkish steam bath and Finnish Sauna, as well as four mouthwatering eateries. Guests will also enjoy further luxurious amenities, including a well-equipped fitness centre and views that stretch across the picturesque surroundings from the rooftop swimming pool.

hotels.title: Stylish Central Munich City Break in Heritage Building with Chic Restaurant & Two Bars
hotels.description: Discover Munich’s playful side at this design-forward hotel, housed in a grand yesteryear post and royal telegraph office opposite the München Hauptbahnhof, Munich's central station. Steeped in Bavarian grandeur, interiors are bespoke with swan motifs, vintage typewriters and dramatic chandeliers. Rest easy in the hotel's well-appointed rooms, unwind with a relaxing sauna bath, or keep your wellness routine in check at the fitness centre. Delight your palate with NENI's Middle Eastern-inspired fare, indulge in some day drinking at the Aperitivo Bar and sip on crafty highballs in the moody Boilerman Bar. Cultural treasures such as Marienplatz, Viktualienmarkt and the art‑filled Kunstareal are easily walkable - or hop on a bike for a scenic ride through the English Garden. Quirky, cosy and utterly stylish, this is the perfect launchpad for exploring Munich.

hotels.title: Central Munich Retro-Chic Luxury near Marienplatz with Onsite Dining & Spa
hotels.description: Step into 1920s Munich elegance with a stay at this five-star retreat in the heart of the city. This luxurious hotel is housed in a historic building, just a stone's throw from the city's main train station. Spend your days exploring the nearby Marienplatz, the city's central square, or the enchanting English Garden, one of the world's largest urban parks. Indulge in the hotel's array of top-notch amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and the tranquil Sofitel SPA, offering traditional Bavarian treatments. Dine at the hotel's on-site restaurant, where you can savour delectable Bavarian and international cuisine. For an evening drink, head to the stylish bar and lounge, where expert mixologists serve up handcrafted cocktails.

hotels.title: Elegant Munich Mövenpick City Break with Two Restaurants near Airport & World's Largest Thermal Spa
hotels.description: Settle in for Bavarian charm with a stay at the sophisticated Mövenpick München Airport, fantastically positioned in leafy Hallbergmoos, moments from Munich International Airport. With sleek, well-appointed rooms and signature Swiss hospitality, this hotel is the perfect launchpad for your city adventures. Spend your days exploring Munich’s buzzing city centre, catching a match at Allianz Arena, or indulging in pure relaxation at the nearby Therme Erding - the world's largest thermal spa. Later, return to your hotel to savour Bavarian and international dishes in the show kitchen or sip a drink under the trees in the seasonal beer garden.
